Malice:
 
The male rubbed her back a little, her silence bothered him.  He thought about picking her up and stting her on the bed, but restrained due to her silence.
"Master, why do you not speak?  Please, tell me what is wrong."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

She still was without say nothing and her head rested in Malice's 
shoulder


- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> Malice put his arms around the femme, and hugged her back.  He 
thought about saying something, but it didn't seem like the time.
> "Master..." he said in a low voice.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> BlackNightmare huged him  and didn't say anything.
> 
> 
> 
>

> > "Is there something wrong?  I'm sorry for whatever I might have 
> done."
> > He took her hand in his and gave it a gentle squeeze.
> > "I am sorry, Master."
> >

back

step 
> > out.
> > > "See you later." she said, winking at Malice.
> > >

> > sweat dropped at the wink from Hellplague, he thought she was 
> trying 
> > to cause trouble.  He looked up to Blacknightmare, a little 
> nervious.

Hellplague

freaked

> > > > out to have someone touching his spark chamber.  Hellplague
